articles.author: Chloe Govan
articles.title: Bruce Willis seen for first time with wife since aphasia forced devastating Hollywood exit - Express
articles.description: BRUCE WILLIS, who has abandoned the showbiz circuit due to his aphasia battle, has been seen for the first time since he was diagnosed with the condition, in a candid Instagram snap shared by his beloved wife Emma.
